reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan to be of good quality, with a nice fit that matches the picture. The sweater is soft, lightweight, and looks wonderful, with one customer noting it has the right amount of stretch for comfort. They like the color, particularly the pink version, and find it comfortable to wear. Opinions about sizing are mixed, with some finding it appropriately sized while others say it runs a little big.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish, Comfortable, and Perfect for Any Occasion!
items.body: I bought this plus-size cardigan as a gift for a friend, and it’s safe to say it was a huge hit! The fabric is a perfect blend of 80% viscose and 20% nylon, giving it a lightweight yet cozy feel. It’s incredibly soft and has just the right amount of stretch to fit comfortably without feeling restrictive. The design is both elegant and practical. The open front with buttons gives it a polished look, and the hip-length cut is flattering for curvier figures. It provides a loose, relaxed fit that allows for easy movement while still looking stylish. One of the best features is its versatility. My friend loves pairing it with everything from jeans to dresses, and it works beautifully for casual days, work meetings, or even dressier occasions. It’s truly a wardrobe staple that you can wear year-round, whether in spring, winter, or anytime in between. The care instructions are simple, which is always a plus—just machine wash in cold water and avoid bleach or ironing. It holds up well and keeps its shape when hung or folded properly. If you’re looking for a thoughtful gift or want to add a classic, comfortable cardigan to your wardrobe, this is a fantastic choice. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: ArtsyChick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits true to size very soft, elegant sweater
items.body: I just started to get into the clothes on Amazon and this is a lovely sweater. It’s soft. It’s dressy as casual. Read more
items.author: Deb

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Sweater
items.body: Like the sweater. Fits well, feels good, sized correctly, hangs nicely. Looks and fits just like the picture. It is just a tad warm for Florida winters but will be OK. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars NICE
items.body: It's a nice sweater but sadly, I think I am between sizes. I got a 2x and it is a little small but I think a 3x would be too big. It is a nice light weight sweater and appears to be well made. Even though it is a little small I will keep it and maybe I'll lose a little weight! (yeah sure) Read more
items.author: Roo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this sweater
items.body: I love this sweater. It thin enough for Arizona winter. Cool in the morning and nice and sunny the rest of the day. I’m sort of rough on sweaters, this has held up nicely to frequent hanging on the back of a chair, tossing it on the seat of the car, wearing it to do housework. It’s easy to wash simply toss it in a cool washer, and put it in the drier. It comes out of the drier perfect. The fit is really nice. Read more
items.author: J

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful sweater
items.body: Beautiful sweater. Fits great. Read more
items.author: Scooby doo.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor workmanship on button holes
items.body: The sweater looked better in the photo than in person, but the reason I returned it was the poor workmanship on the button holes. It was very hard to get the buttons unbuttoned. Basically, the button size didn't fit the hole size. Read more
items.author: Lee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful
items.body: It's feels great, nice and soft. Love the color (pink) and length, and saw no loose threading. The thickness isn't plush but it isn't paper thin like other brands either, it's thin enough to not make you hot but thick enough to keep warm on a cool breezy evening, layered would keep you warm and toasty. I wanted it a bit looser and droopy so I sized up and it was perfect. Mine came with a fairly strong smell to it which was a bit of a bother, even after a couple of washes, I would suggest airing it out for a while if sensitive to smells like I am. All in all, definitely worth the money. Read more
items.author: Nelda B.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Z Khaki, Purple Gray, Olive Green, Pure White, Black, Navy Blue, Dark Green, Light Blue, Rose Red, Wine Red, Pink, Pumpkin Orange, Christmas Red, Peacock Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
